function.description: Check Docker Compose service status on a remote host via SSH.
function.name: infra.check_stack

compose_dir.description: Absolute path to the Docker Compose project directory on the remote host.

host.description: SSH host target (e.g. user@hostname or an SSH config alias).

services.description: List of service names to query. If null or empty, all services in the compose file are returned.
